message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $95 for the product.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think you'll find that this product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. However, I've already told you that I'm looking to make a profit, and $100 is the minimum I'm willing to accept from you. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but I'm not going to go any lower. So, I'll stick with my previous counteroffer of $110.
